hooks.command: session=$(tmux display-message -p '#{session_name}' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); tmux_info=$(tmux display-message -p '#{session_name}:#{window_index}.#{pane_index}' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); notify-send -a "Claude Code ($session)" 'Permission Required' "From: $tmux_info"

session=$(tmux display-message -p '#{session_name}' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); tmux_info=$(tmux display-message -p '#{session_name}:#{window_index}.#{pane_index}' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); notify-send -a "Claude Code ($session)" 'Input Required' "From: $tmux_info"
